knimeNode.name: Keras Network Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a Keras network from an input file.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads a Keras deep learning network from an input file. The file can either contain a full, pre-trained network (.h5 file) or just a network specification without weights (.json or .yaml file).
fullDescription.option: The path to the input file that contains the Keras network. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.

option.name: Copy deep learning network into KNIME workflow?

fullDescription.option: If selected, the Keras network will be copied into the KNIME workflow, so that it is available for export with the workflow. Otherwise, only a reference to the actual network file is used by KNIME.
